00021 #ifndef PARALLELPAIRCALC_H
00022 #define PARALLELPAIRCALC_H
00023 
00024 
00025 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00026 #include <votca/tools/thread.h>
00027 #include <votca/tools/mutex.h>
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00031 
00032 class ParallelPairCalculator : public QMCalculator
00033 {
00034 
00035 public:
00036 
00037     ParallelPairCalculator() : _nextPair(NULL) {};
00038    ~ParallelPairCalculator() {};
00039 
00040     string       Identify() { return "Parallel pair calculator"; }
00041 
00042     bool         EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);
00043     virtual void InitSlotData(Topology *top) { ; }
00044     virtual void PostProcess(Topology *top) { ; }
00045     virtual void EvalPair(Topology *top, QMPair *qmpair, int slot) { ; }
00046 
00047     QMPair     *RequestNextPair(int opId, Topology *top);
00048     void         LockCout() { _coutMutex.Lock(); }
00049     void         UnlockCout() { _coutMutex.Unlock(); }
00050 
00051 
00052     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00053     // Pair workers (i.e. individual threads) //
00054     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00055 
00056     class PairOperator : public Thread
00057     {
00058     public:
00059 
00060         PairOperator(int id, Topology *top,
00061                      ParallelPairCalculator *master)
00062                    : _id(id), _top(top), _pair(NULL),
00063                      _master(master)      {};
00064 
00065        ~PairOperator() {};
00066 
00067         int  getId() { return _id; }
00068         void setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00069 
00070         void Run(void);
00071         
00072 
00073     protected:
00074 
00075         int                      _id;
00076         Topology                *_top;
00077         QMPair                 *_pair;
00078         ParallelPairCalculator  *_master;
00079     };
00080 
00081 
00082 protected:
00083 
00084     QMNBList::iterator   _nextPair;
00085     Mutex                 _nextPairMutex;
00086     Mutex                 _coutMutex;
00087 
00088 
00089 };
00090 
00091 bool ParallelPairCalculator::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00092 
00093     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
00094     if (!top->isRigid()) {
00095         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
00096         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
00097     }
00098     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
00099     cout << endl;        
00100 
00101     vector<PairOperator*> pairOps;
00102     this->InitSlotData(top);
00103 
00104     _nextPair = top->NBList().begin();
00105 
00106     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00107         PairOperator *newOp = new PairOperator(id, top, this);
00108         pairOps.push_back(newOp);
00109     }
00110 
00111     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00112         pairOps[id]->Start();
00113     }
00114 
00115     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00116         pairOps[id]->WaitDone();
00117     }
00118 
00119     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00120         delete pairOps[id];
00121     }
00122 
00123     pairOps.clear();
00124 
00125     this->PostProcess(top);
00126     return 1;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 // +++++++++++++++++ //
00131 // Thread Management //
00132 // +++++++++++++++++ //
00133 
00134 QMPair *ParallelPairCalculator::RequestNextPair(int opId, Topology *top) {
00135 
00136     _nextPairMutex.Lock();
00137 
00138     QMPair *workOnThis;
00139 
00140     if (_nextPair == top->NBList().end()) {
00141         workOnThis = NULL;
00142     }
00143     else {
00144         QMPair *workOnThat = *_nextPair;
00145         _nextPair++;
00146         workOnThis = workOnThat;
00147     }
00148 
00149     _nextPairMutex.Unlock();
00150 
00151     return workOnThis;
00152 }
00153 
00154 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00155 // PairOperator Member Functions //
00156 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00157 
00158 void ParallelPairCalculator::PairOperator::Run(void) {
00159 
00160     while (true) {
00161 
00162         QMPair *qmpair = _master->RequestNextPair(_id, _top);
00163 
00164         if (qmpair == NULL) { break; }
00165         else { this->_master->EvalPair(_top, qmpair, _id); }
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 }}
